data.title: Individual Breed Classes & Parade of Breeds Presented By Select Breeders Services
data.meta_description: Devon, PA – Tuesday, September 26, 2023 – The 2023 edition of Dressage at Devon presented by Kingsview Partners got off to a great start this morning with the Breed Division, which will be held over the course of three days, continuing through Thursday, September 28th. A USEF Heritage Event and the first FEI World […]
data.text:
Devon, PA – Tuesday, September 26, 2023 – The 2023 edition of Dressage at Devon presented by Kingsview Partners got off to a great start this morning with the Breed Division, which will be held over the course of three days, continuing through Thursday, September 28th. A USEF Heritage Event and the first FEI World Cup Qualifier of the qualifying year, Dressage at Devon welcomes top riders, horses, and judges from around the nation and across the globe to compete in both the Breed and Performance Divisions. Following the Breed Division, the Performance Division will kick off on Friday, September 29th. Throughout the competition, Dressage at Devon is proud to offer countless Educational and Specialty Events. The energy in the air at the Devon Horse Show Grounds is palpable, and the magical experience at Dressage at Devon is enjoyed by spectators and competitors alike.

Dressage at Devon is one of the largest dressage-based open-breed shows in the world. Opening day of the Breed Division welcomed the Individual Breed Classes (IBC), featuring the many breeds seen competing throughout the levels in Dressage today. From Hanoverian’s, to Highland Ponies, to Thoroughbreds, to Oldenburgs, the IBC’s give each breed a chance to take center stage and compete against horses of their same breed. Upon completion of the IBC’s, the winners of each breed were invited to receive their tri-color honors in the Parade of Breeds sponsored by Select Breeders Services.

Dressage at Devon Parade of Breeds 2023 – Photo Credit: Olivia Airhart, Mane Source Media, LLC for Phelps Media Group

IBC: ISR-Oldenburg- Sponsored by the ISR-Oldenburg Registry North America

Winner: Gail Zambor & Everglow

2022 Filly By Everdale, Owned by Nicholsen Hansen, Bred by Nicholsen Hansen

Photo Credit: Olivia Airhart, Mane Source Media, LLC for Phelps Media Group

IBC: Hanoverian- Sponsored by American Hanoverian Society

Winner: Anna Crane & Downtown HU

2019 Gelding By Dacaprio × Pik L, Owned by Anna Crane, Bred by Horses Unlimited

Photo Credit: Olivia Airhart, Mane Source Media, LLC for Phelps Media Group

IBC: Oldenburg (GOV) – Sponsored by Oldenburg Horse Breeders Society, N.A. Division of Verband der Zuchter des Oldenburger Pferdes e.V.

Winner: Hannah Irons & Equito’s Davisha

2020 Mare By De Niro 6 × Fürstenball, Owned By: Fie Studnitz Andersen

Hannah and Equito’s Davish were also awarded The German Oldenburg Verband Perpetual Trophy (Donnerhall) – which is awarded to the Highest Scoring Registered Oldenburg in the open classes each year.

Photo Credit: Olivia Airhart, Mane Source Media, LLC for Phelps Media Group

IBC: Highland Pony – Sponsored by Highlands registered with Highland Pony Enthusiasts Club of America

Winner: Jennifer Clover & MacCrimmon Andrew

2007 Stallion by Roderick of Croila × Ruaridh of Mendick, Owned by MacCrimmon Stud LLC, Bred by Mary Ellen Erickson

Photo Credit: Olivia Airhart, Mane Source Media, LLC for Phelps Media Group

IBC: Appaloosa – Sponsored by the Appaloosa Horse Club

Winner: Ted Zajac VMD & Couture

2022 Filly by Full Medal Jacket × Waps Infinity, Owned by Ted Zajac VMD, Bred by Brittany Boyette

Photo Credit: Olivia Airhart, Mane Source Media, LLC for Phelps Media Group

IBC: Lusitano – Sponsored by US Lusitano Association

Winner: Miguel Undabarrena & Legendario dos diamantes

2014 Stallion By Dante Dos Diamantes, Owned by Anna Nina Lee, Bred by P.T.M. Agricola E Participacos LTDA

Photo Credit: Olivia Airhart, Mane Source Media, LLC for Phelps Media Group

IBC: Morgan – Sponsored by Starberry Sport Morgans

Winner: Lindsey Berry & Starberry Solstice

2023 Stallion By CM Sunday Kode × Equinox Challenge, Owned by Lindsey Berry, Bred by Lindsey Berry

Photo Credit: Olivia Airhart, Mane Source Media, LLC for Phelps Media Group

IBC: KWPN – Sponsored by KWPN-NA

Winner: Quinnten Alston & Tuxedo ISF

2023 Colt By Cum Laude × Apache, Owned by Iron Spring Farm Inc., Bred by Iron Spring Farm Inc.

Photo Credit: Olivia Airhart, Mane Source Media, LLC for Phelps Media Group

IBC: Friesian – Sponsored by Friends of the Friesian Horse

Winner: Quinnten Alston & Rosalee ISF

2021 Filly By Tjalbert 460 × Teade, Owned by Iron Spring Farm Inc., Bred by Iron Spring Farm Inc.

Photo Credit: Olivia Airhart, Mane Source Media, LLC for Phelps Media Group

IBC: Menorcan – Sponsored by PR Menorcan USA

Winner: Bruce Griffin & Ganador

2016 Stallion By Rostoll, Owned by Beverly Durham Foster

Photo Credit: Olivia Airhart, Mane Source Media, LLC for Phelps Media Group

IBC: Thoroughbred – Sponsored by Campbell Horse Transportation LLC

Winner: Bruce Griffin III & Great Quest

2017 Gelding By Flatter xx × Dehere xx, Owned by Hannah Ong, Bred by Quest Realty

Photo Credit: Olivia Airhart, Mane Source Media, LLC for Phelps Media Group

IBC: Knabstrupper – Sponsored by Foxden Equine

Winner: Cara Klothe & Picasso AF Midgard

2019 Gelding By Pikko del Cerro HU × Pegasus vom Niehaus-Hof, Owned by Lindsey Martell, Bred by Martha Mitchell

Photo Credit: Olivia Airhart, Mane Source Media, LLC for Phelps Media Group

IBC: Cleveland Bay – Sponsored by Friends of the Mid-Atlantic Cleveland Bay Horse

Winner: Shaunna Dunlap & Epiphanybay Independence

2009 Mare By Penrhyn Bayswater × Tregoyd Jouneyman, Owned by Michele Novack, Bred by Carlene Kerr

Photo Credit: Olivia Airhart, Mane Source Media, LLC for Phelps Media Group

IBC: Half Arabian – Sponsored by Lucky Day Arabians

Winner: Jennette Aubert & Bluffing Birdie LD

2021 Filly By MW Bodacious × B-Mumm Cognac, Owned by Jennette Aubert, Bred by Jennette Aubert

Photo Credit: Olivia Airhart, Mane Source Media, LLC for Phelps Media Group

Also awarded their ribbons in the Dixon Oval were Hannah Heritage & Famira ZA, a 2021 Filly By Faramund, Owned by Hannah Heritage, Bred by Hannah Heritage in the Westfalen IBC – Sponsored by Westfalen Verband as well as Cara Kettenbach & Aalykkes Superiella, a 2021 Filly By So Perfect, Owned by Cara Kettenbach in the Danish Warmblood IBC – Sponsored by Old Raptor Farm.

To view the full results for the Dressage at Devon presented by Kingsview Partners Breed Competition, click here.
